Title: The Story Marketability Bundle: Add Marketing to Your Craft
Description: Two powerful books, Story Symmetry and Editing for Marketability, get new editions that explore 50+ psychological triggers w/ examples

Steps.Description: Get a digital copy of our messaging and copywriting framework + a full list of StoryUrge psychological triggers.

Steps.Title: One Book
Steps.Description: Get Story Symmetry OR Editing for Marketability in ebook. Also get all previous digital tiers!

Steps.Title: One Ebook + Audiobook
Steps.Description: Get Story Symmetry OR Editing for Marketability in ebook and audiobook. Both ebook and audiobook must be the same. Also get all the StoryUrge Messaging Framework.

Steps.Title: Two Ebooks
Steps.Description: Get Story Symmetry AND Editing for Marketability in ebook. Also get the StoryUrge Messaging Framework.
